doc.title: The Perfect Woman
doc.plot: Legend has it, That there is a land hidden deep within the wild, A land that doesn't age, A land that travels, A land that no human being can discover, Unless it is your fate. This sacred place is only populated by women. And not just any kind of women, the perfect women. It is told, that men, who are lucky enough to touch this land find their perfect match. But before that, they must go through a process: To experience and understand what it is like to be Her - and only through that, will they discover who their Perfect Woman is. Set in the late 40s, the story follows the journey of a young Taiwanese man who stumbles across the Land of the Women and experiences the pleasure and the pain of what he must go through to find his perfect woman.
